attributes.action: Give healthcare workers extra £10K to help them work in such extreme conditions
attributes.background: The government have had a £10K pay rise to be able to work from home now help the healthcare workers!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, calling for similar actions:

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172 

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619 

Pay bonus to all key workers: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215 

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073 

Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306
